item.title: Create Bastion in AWS to Reach OpenShift Over Private VPC
item.description: Create Bastion in AWS to Reach OpenShift Over Private VPC vpc peering request from VPC-A vpc peering accept from VPC-B set route from VPC-A to VPC-B on all route definitions set route from VPC-B to VPC-A on all route definitions set security group allow on VPC-A sg’s to accpet connections from VPC-B set security group allow on VPC-B sg’s to accpet connections from VPC-A
